derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English siwan, of Germanic origin, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin suere and Greek suein

encyclopedia.content: 德国SEW-传动设备公司成立于1931年，是专业生产电动机、减速机和变频控制设备的跨国性国际集团，在全世界拥有员工10000多名，其生产技术和市场占有率均居世界领先地位，在国际动力传输领域举世闻名。 SEW-传动设备有限公司是德国SEW集团在华独资企业。公司采用全套进口设备及工艺，按照德国SEW标准向国内外客户提供各类优质工业减速机、减速电机及变频控制设备。

entry.def: When you sew something such as clothes, you make them or repair them by joining pieces of cloth together by passing thread through them with a needle.

example.ex: She sewed the dresses on the sewing machine...
example.tran: 她在缝纫机上缝制衣服。

example.ex: Anyone can sew on a button, including you...
example.tran: 任何人都能缝纽扣，包括你。

entry.def: When something such as a hand or finger is sewn back by a doctor, it is joined with the patient's body using a needle and thread.

example.ex: The hand was preserved in ice by neighbours and sewn back on in hospital...
example.tran: 手被邻居用冰块保存起来了，在医院又被缝合好了。

example.ex: Surgeons at Odstock Hospital, Wilts, sewed the thumb on.
example.tran: 威尔特郡奥德斯多克医院的外科医生将大拇指缝合上了。

sentences.sentence: "Can the seamstress sew me a suit by next week?"

list.explanation: 使某事圆满结束，获得最后成功

example.en: Let's sew this up and get out of here.
example.zh: 让我们把这事做成了,再离开此地。

list.explanation: 确保胜利，获得决定性的一分

example.en: The last-period goal sewed it up for the Drew Ranpre.
example.zh: 那最后阶段进的球奠定了德鲁巡警队的最后胜利。

Sentence.sentence: Even if I am on vacation in the mountains, I am eating food someone else has grown, living in a house someone else has built, wearing clothes someone else has sewn from cloth woven by others, using electricity someone else is distributing to my house.

Even if I am on vacation in the mountains, I am eating food someone else has grown, living in a house someone else has built, wearing clothes someone else has sewn from cloth woven by others, using electricity someone else is distributing to my house.

sentences.en: She has been sewing all morning.
sentences.cn: 她早上一直在做针线活。

sentences.en: My mother sewed a new cotton-padded jacket for me.
sentences.cn: 妈妈给我缝制一件新棉袄。

jushi.english: When her work was done, she read, sewed and sang.
jushi.chinese: 工作完毕后,她就读书、缝纫、唱歌。

jushi.english: He was sewing a new coat.
jushi.chinese: 他正在缝制一件新外套。
